kpi_info.title: Reassembly timer expirations
kpi_info.use: Reassembly timer expirations (STR-NM-M4NE-REQ-02.00). The number of reassembled AAL5 Common Part Convergence Sublayer Protocol Data Units (CPCS-PDU) whose reassembly timer has expired. When a reassembly timer expires, the current CPCS-PDU is discarded. A PDU time-out occurs when a partially received PDU is not complete within a set time period. The period is fixed by the system as 1 second.
